summary: Pica is an eating disorder where people crave and eat non-food items like dirt, paint, or paper. It can be dangerous, causing poisoning, stomach problems, or infections. Pica is more common in pregnant women, young children, and those with developmental disabilities. Stress and mental health issues can also be factors. If it lasts more than a month and isn't a cultural practice, it's considered a serious problem.
title: Pica (disorder)
